title: Behind the Rage
description: This book/title is no longer available for undisclosed reasons. Â Between the Rage & Grace,Behind the Rage and Unjustified Favor are scheduled to release in late 2016 as the Clan Destiny series books I, II and III accordingly.Behind the Rage, the prequel to Between the Rage and Grace spans thirty years of history between Mary Magdalene, a damaged recluse and the gregarious Vivian Cature. The two bond instantly at Saint Anthony's orphanage but friendship goes awry. The bonds made as best friends become weapons of destruction when mixed with magic and envy in a sordid love triangle.
author: Janna Hill
